original_text: So Jephthah went with the elders of Gilead, and the people made him head and commander over them. And he repeated all his words before the Lord in Mizpah.
korean_text: 이에 입다가 길르앗 장로들과 함께 가니 백성이 그를 자기들의 머리와 장관을 삼은지라 입다가 미스바에서 자기의 말을 다 여호와 앞에 아뢰니라

sentences.original_text: So Jephthah went with the elders of Gilead
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 입다가 길르앗 장로들과 함께 갔고

sentences.original_text: and the people made him head
And he repeated all his words
